member.name: IMFTimecodeTranslate.BeginConvertHNSToTimecode
member.summary: Starts an asynchronous call to convert time in 100-nanosecond units to Society of Motion Picture and Television Engineers (SMPTE) time code.
member.param: The time to convert, in 100-nanosecond units.
Pointer to the interface of a callback object. The caller must implement this interface.

Pointer to the IUnknown interface of a state object, defined by the caller. This parameter can be NULL. You can use this object to hold state information. The object is returned to the caller when the callback is invoked.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The object's Shutdown method was called.
The byte stream is not seekable. The time code cannot be read from the end of the byte stream.

member.name: IMFTimecodeTranslate.BeginConvertTimecodeToHNS
member.summary: Starts an asynchronous call to convert Society of Motion Picture and Television Engineers (SMPTE) time code to 100-nanosecond units.
member.param: Time in SMPTE time code to convert. The vt member of the PROPVARIANT structure is set to VT_I8. The hVal.QuadPart member contains the time in binary coded decimal (BCD) form. See Remarks.
Pointer to the interface of a callback object. The caller must implement this interface.

PPointer to the IUnknown interface of a state object, defined by the caller. This parameter can be NULL. You can use this object to hold state information. The object is returned to the caller when the callback is invoked.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The object's Shutdown method was called.
The byte stream is not seekable. The time code cannot be read from the end of the byte stream.

member.name: IMFTimecodeTranslate.EndConvertHNSToTimecode
member.summary: Completes an asynchronous request to convert time in 100-nanosecond units to Society of Motion Picture and Television Engineers (SMPTE) time code.
member.param: A pointer to the interface. Pass in the same pointer that your callback object received in the method.

A pointer to a PROPVARIANT that receives the converted time. The vt member of the PROPVARIANT structure is set to VT_I8. The hVal.QuadPart member contains the converted time in binary coded decimal (BCD) form. See Remarks.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimecodeTranslate.EndConvertTimecodeToHNS
member.summary: Completes an asynchronous request to convert time in Society of Motion Picture and Television Engineers (SMPTE) time code to 100-nanosecond units.
member.param: Pointer to the interface. Pass in the same pointer that your callback object received in the method.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimecodeTranslate
member.summary: Converts between Society of Motion Picture and Television Engineers (SMPTE) time codes and 100-nanosecond time units.
